I am a JUnit novice as well as a JAVA novice.

I have worked with ORACLE (not at the DBA level).

Would it ba appropriate to trap this and other specific error codes and
provide a response in English (e.g.: "server must be restarted")

The DBA should be helpful in defining these codes - messages.
Some 'occurrences' are beyond the control of the user in development, test
or production.  User friendly guidance is important in all cases.

I hope you find this helpful.


                Clark Anderson
